name: plasma-fists
effect: After inflicting damage, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn, including status moves. This effect is applied after move type-changing abilities, such as Pixilate and Normalize.

flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks with electrically charged fists.
This move changes Normal-type moves to
Electric-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks with electrically charged fists.
This move changes Normal-type moves to
Electric-type moves.
